channel.title: Open car door with RFID/NFC
channel.description:
This thread is a duplicate of http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,534083.20.html
I just wanted to get this community's opinions on the options that I have.
tl;dr I want to make a device that opens my car door when my keys(transmitter) are within 2-3 meters of the receiver(device in the car).

item.title: Open car door with RFID/NFC
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The transmitter will be attached to the keyring. And if the door remains unlocked while the keys are within 2-3 meters, then the keys could (almost) never be locked inside the car. The only thing that I could think of that might happen is the battery (if I use one) dies while the keys are inside.

Read full topic

item.title: Open car door with RFID/NFC
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

So how exactly are you going to keep your transmitter on you at all times, but can’t keep your keys or some other unlocking device with you at all times? :L

Read full topic
